title: Episode 190: Boundary Goals with Besidone Amoruwa
itunes:title: Episode 190: Boundary Goals with Besidone Amoruwa
itunes:subtitle: Kate takes inspiration from today’s guest and wakes up early to write, and Doree looks forward to having the house to herself. Then, Besidone Amoruwa, Manager of Strategic Content and Creator Partnerships at Instagram, shares why waking up at 5 a.m. is...
description:
Kate takes inspiration from today’s guest and wakes up early to write, and Doree looks forward to having the house to herself. Then, Besidone Amoruwa, Manager of Strategic Content and Creator Partnerships at Instagram, shares why waking up at 5 a.m. is the ultimate self-care, the many ways she’s learned to set boundaries in her life, and what you should do if you want to become an influencer. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter 


This episode is sponsored by:
